summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department; authorizing the acquisition of certain property in Tract 24, D. W. West's Acre Tracts to South Seattle for water reservoir purposes; making an appropriation from the surplus in the Water Fund therefor as a Betterment outlay; providing for the sale and conveyance to the Port of Seattle of certain property in Tract 26 of said D. W. West's Acre Tracts to South Seattle for cash and certain property in Tract 23 of said D. W. West's Acre Tracts to South Seattle.
